name: Defenestration
description:
Defenestration is a game about throwing people out of windows.

In Defenestration, your job is to throw red people out of windows.If you throw anyone else out, you will be thrown out the window. So don't try to mess with the white or green people.

You can set how fast the game gets harder in the options menu, and even set the time limit, so you can play forever!

Controls

W,A,S,D to move

Mouse to look

LeftClick to pickup/throw

ESC to pause

ENTER to restart round
